Grioth cultists represent the lowest tier of their remorseless cult—worshippers of the [Elder Mythos](/DeityCategories.aspx?ID=13) tasked with leading scouting missions into new worlds. Though ranked above scouts in the chain of command, they occupy a lowly place in the overall religious hierarchy. Though whispered rumors describe the legendary rituals needed to wrench worlds from their suns, these cultists don't learn this potent magic. Such secrets are left to grioth high priests, who are always the last to arrive in a colonized world. Most grioths worship the Outer God [Nyarlathotep](/Deities.aspx?ID=164) in one of his many incarnations, although some worship other entities of the Elder Mythos such as [Azathoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=161), [Nhimbaloth](/Deities.aspx?ID=163), or [Yog-Sothoth](/Deities.aspx?ID=166). In the highly rare cases where a grioth is cut off from their society and given the opportunity to explore other religions, they still lean into faiths associated with the stars or the night, such as [Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5) or [Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=20). However, these grioths are loathed by others of their own kind, who view them as dangerous heretics. **[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)** ([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 23 **[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 21 **[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 18 [Grioth Cultist](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1181) **Source** [Bestiary 3](/Sources.aspx?ID=66) pg. 123 **Perception** +10; [greater darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), echolocation (precise) 20 feet **Languages** [Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Grioth](/Languages.aspx?ID=65); [telepathy](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=37) 30 feet **Skills** [Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +8, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +9, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +10, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10 **Str** +0 **Dex** +3 **Con** +2 **Int** +2 **Wis** +3 **Cha** +0 **Echolocation** A grioth can use its hearing as a precise sense at the listed range **Items** [voidglass kukri](/Weapons.aspx?ID=56) --- **AC** 18 **Fort** +7 **Ref** +10 **Will** +10 **HP** 40 **Immunities** cold **Weaknesses** fire 5 **[Light Blindness](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=22)**
**No Breath** A grioth doesn't breathe except to speak and is immune to effects that require breathing (such as an [inhaled](/Traits.aspx?ID=96) [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)). --- **Speed** 25 feet, fly 30 feet **Melee** kukri +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)), **Damage** 1d6+2 slashing **Melee** jaws +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)), **Damage** 1d8+2 piercing plus grioth venom **Divine Prepared Spells** DC 20, attack +12 - **Cantrips (3rd)** [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Forbidding Ward](/Spells.aspx?ID=126), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Stabilize](/Spells.aspx?ID=307) - **1st** [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Ventriloquism](/Spells.aspx?ID=356) - **2nd** [Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292) **Occult Innate Spells** DC 19, attack +11 - **Cantrips (2nd)** [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Telekinetic Projectile](/Spells.aspx?ID=334) - **2nd** [Phantom Pain](/Spells.aspx?ID=220) **Grioth Venom** ([Emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [Fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 20; **Maximum Duration** 6 rounds; **Stage 1** [frightened 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=19) (1 round); **Stage 2** frightened 2 (1 round); **Stage 3** frightened 3 (1 round) **Shock Mind** ([Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120)) The grioth scout makes a Strike with a voidglass weapon. If the Strike hits, it deals an additional 2d6 mental damage, and the target must succeed at a DC 20 Will save (this has the [incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93) trait) or become [confused](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5) for 1 round. **Invoke Haunter of the Dark** ([Divine](/Traits.aspx?ID=48), [Enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [Mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106), [Visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** The grioth cultist waves a hand in a complex pattern to invoke dark powers, dealing 3d8 mental damage. Each non-grioth creature within 20 feet must attempt a DC 20 Will save.
**Critical Success** The creature is unaffected.
**Success** The creature takes half damage
**Failure** The creature takes full damage and becomes [stupefied 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=37) for 1 round
**Critical Failure** The creature takes double damage and becomes stupefied 1 for 1 minute.
